mapper.select: SELECT s_id,s_fmImg,s_title,s_num,s_price,s_price_yuan FROM scenery WHERE s_num > 4.5 AND s_price > 2000 AND s_price < 3000 LIMIT 0,9
SELECT se_id FROM sed WHERE se_strat = (SELECT c_id FROM city WHERE c_name LIKE CONCAT(#{start_city},'%')) AND se_end = (SELECT c_id FROM city WHERE c_name like CONCAT(#{end_city},'%'))
SELECT cl.cc_id,cl.se_id,cl.cc_send,cl.cc_end,ca.c_type,cl.cc_price FROM carclass cl,cartype ca WHERE cl.c_typeid = ca.c_typeid AND cl.se_id = #{se_id} AND cc_send like CONCAT(#{stime},'%')
SELECT tl.tc_id,tl.se_id,tl.tc_send,tl.tc_end,ta.t_type,tl.tc_price FROM trainclass tl,traintype ta WHERE tl.t_typeid = ta.t_typeid AND tl.se_id = #{se_id} AND tc_send LIKE CONCAT(#{stime},'%')

SELECT pl.pc_id,pl.se_id,pl.pc_send,pl.pc_end,pl.p_typeid,pa.p_type,pl.pc_price FROM planeclass pl,planetype pa WHERE pl.p_typeid = pa.p_typeid AND pl.se_id = #{se_id} AND pc_send LIKE CONCAT(#{stime},'%')
